name: Let Chat Guess
description:
In Let Chat Guess, the goal of the game is simple, be the one who guesses the closest distance that the catapulted character will travel!
Put your Twitch chat and/or friends to the test and let them try to guess the correct distance!

You don't have to be a Streamer to play the game!

Solo player? No worries! Try to climb the rankings and get on top of the leaderboards!
There are 3 unique catapults which are all physics based!
Choose between multiple characters with different attributes!
